introduction.section1: Do you want to join us to discover the jewel of the Philippines on the Palawan Island?
introduction.section2: Grab your mask and snorkel or dive in these crystal clear waters that will leave you a lasting impression. Take advantage of the different tours called "Island hopping" to choose what suits you best.
introduction.section3: Find out our travelogue followed by our detailed visits.

meta-description: Join us to discover the jewel of the Philippines. In each article, we answer to your questions: When to go? How many days ? What budget to plan? How to get there? Why ? When? How long and at what period? Without forgetting the addresses and prices.
title: El Nido
